statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_certifications FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_agreements FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT vendor_name FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_certifications->>'ISO' = '9001';
SELECT * FROM vendor_documents ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_certifications FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_agreements FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_certifications->>'certification' = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT agreement_text, agreement_date FROM agreements WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1 AND vendor_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE agreement_date < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month'
SELECT vendor_name AS name, vendor_phone AS phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM vendors JOIN agreements ON vendors.vendor_id = agreements.vendor_id
SELECT * FROM vendor_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM vendor_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_date FROM vendor_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_body = 'ISO' AND certification_validity > '2022-06-30';
SELECT certification_name, certification_body, certification_validity FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_validity;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM vendor_documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_validity DESC;
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM vendor_documents WHERE document_name LIKE 'Invoice%';
SELECT certification_name, certification_validity FROM certifications WHERE certification_body = 'ISO'
SELECT * FROM vendor_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM vendor_documents WHERE uploaded_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_type, agreement_date FROM agreements WHERE vendor_id = UUID('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_info WHERE contract_signed = TRUE;
SELECT certification_id, certification_type, expiration_date FROM certifications ORDER BY issued_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_documents ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_info WHERE contract_signed = TRUE;
SELECT document_name, document_type, uploaded_date FROM vendor_documents WHERE vendor_id = 'abc123';
SELECT certification_type, issued_date, expiration_date FROM certifications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT agreement_terms FROM agreements WHERE vendor_id = 'xyz456';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, certification_name, certification_expiry FROM vendors JOIN certifications ON vendors.vendor_id = certifications.vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, certification_name, certification_authority FROM vendors JOIN certifications ON vendors.vendor_id = certifications.vendor_id;
SELECT contact_name, vendor_name FROM vendor_contacts JOIN vendors ON vendor_contacts.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
